subject: Baseball
Football
lead_paragraph: In 1979, the Yankees reserve catcher Cliff Johnson scuffled with the star reliever Goose Gossage, who was out for 12 weeks with a torn ligament in his pitching hand.
snippet: In 1979, the Yankees reserve catcher Cliff Johnson scuffled with the star reliever Goose Gossage, who was out for 12 weeks with a torn ligament in his pitching hand.
